title: Relationship Goals: Part 2
description:
Sadie welcomes Michael Todd, Lead Pastor of Transformation Church based in Tulsa, OK for a bonus episode, part two of their conversation, Relationship Goals. Listen in as they welcome their spouses and discuss trust, forgiveness, and vulnerability within relationships. Pastor Todd also discusses his new book, Relationship Goals —based on the viral sermon series about dating, marriage, and sex.  .
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
